executable.title: Get Connectivity Matrix
executable.description: This tool computes the connectivity matrix using a label map. You can either use the connectivity maps corresponding to all of the labels in the label map or a tracts file containing the full brain tractography. The connectivity maps or the tractography have to be in the same space than the label map. If you give a tracts file and connectivity maps, the connectivity maps will be used. At the end of the process, a text file containing the IDs of all the labels in the way they are used in the matrix will be created in the same folder than the matrix : Matrix_Labels.txt.

file.name: ConnecMapsFile
file.description: This csv file contains the paths to all the connectivity map files, corresponding to all the labels in the Label Map.
file.label: Connec Maps File

integer.name: ConnecMapsFileIndex
integer.description: The index of the column containing the paths to the connectivity maps (1 for the first column)
integer.label: Connec Maps File Index

boolean.name: isCostMap
boolean.description: Enable if the given Connectivity maps are cost maps: the values will be inverted.
boolean.label: is Cost Map

string-vector.name: TractsFiles
string-vector.description: Vector with vtk files containing the tract files. Separate each file with a comma.
string-vector.label: Tracts Files

image.name: LabelMap
image.description: Label map 3D image : 1 label for each voxel
image.label: Label Map

file.name: MatrixFile
file.description: The file that will contain the matrix
file.label: Matrix File

string-enumeration.name: MatrixMetric
string-enumeration.description: The way to compute the elements of the matrix
string-enumeration.label: Matrix Metric

boolean.name: useRegionBoundary
boolean.description: For a given region, the connectivity will be computed only using the voxels on the boundary of each region. Used only with connectivity maps, not with tracts files.
boolean.label: use Region Boundary
